Home » Services » Legacy Giving » Generosity Fund

Your giving. Managed.

Open a Generosity Fund®
Terms and Conditions

All your charitable giving in one place.

A Generosity Fund® is a Donor Advised Fund (DAF) that provides a convenient, tax-efficient way to manage your giving—from tithing to disaster relief, and all donations in between. Our frictionless process makes even complex securities easier to give than ever.

How it works
Create & contribute

Open a Generosity Fund® online, and fund it with cash or appreciated assets. You may receive immediate tax benefits.

Frictionless

AG Foundation takes it from there, keeping track of your giving while handling the details.

Whenever, wherever

Continue giving when and to whom you want by accessing your Generosity Fund® online. You may even give anonymously.

It starts with what you give.
  • Cash
  • Household income
  • Proceeds from selling a home or business
  • Stocks
  • Securities
  • A variety of other funding sources
  • $10,000 minimum

Additional funding can be made with as little as $100, as often as you like.

Open a Generosity Fund®

How it works

Create your personal Generosity Fund®, and deposit cash or appreciated assets. You should receive immediate tax benefits. You may give any time you like by accessing your online fund. AG Foundation takes it from there, keeping track of your giving and reducing your paperwork. You may also give anonymously if desired.

Assets you may give

Start your Generosity Fund® with a minimum requirement of $10,000. Additional funding can be made with as little as $100, and made as often as you like. Other ways to fund include:

  • Household income
  • Proceeds from selling a home or business
  • Stocks
  • Securities
  • A variety of other funding sources

Make the most of your giving.

Let’s discover the best way for you to give, and in the easiest way possible.

Simple, joyful giving.
Powered by your generosity.

Start a Generosity Fund®
See Terms & Conditions

How it works

Your personal Generosity Fund® can be set up online in just minutes. You deposit cash or appreciated assets, and receive immediate tax benefits. And when you’re ready to give, you can access your online fund from your phone, tablet or your computer–however you want and whenever you want. AG Foundation works to take care of the details for you, keeping track of your giving and reducing your paperwork. And you are provided the option of giving anonymously, if desired.

Types of Assets You May Give

A Generosity Fund® is funded with cash, with an initial minimum requirement of $10,000. Additional funding can be made with as little as $100, and made as often as you desire. Additional funding sources can include your household income, proceeds from selling a home or business, or a variety of other sources including stocks and securities.

If you are interested in additional funding options, contact us for a customized solution for you.Contact Us

The Generosity Fund® provides for easy management for all your charitable giving in one place. So, whether you want to make recurring gifts to your church, or want funds available for when you want to support a need such as disaster relief or a food pantry, the Generosity Fund® makes giving convenient. Giving on your schedule, 24/7.

Not just for the wealthy.

A Generosity Fund® is a giving tool that is available to anyone, regardless of income level. The value provided by the Fund is found in its convenience and simplification of both your current and future giving.

Set Up Your Generosity Fund® Today

Open Your Generosity Fund®
